properties.areaDesc: Western Mackinac; Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island/Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa
properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued January 8 at 2:30PM EST until January 9 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Southeast Chippewa, Western Mackinac, Eastern Mackinac
and Mackinac Island/Bois Blanc Island Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property
including parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses will
be inundated near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
